name: Pet of the Week – Myles & Chief
description: This week we get to meet two best buds from our Carlsbad shelter, Myles and Chief. Chief is a little more outgoing than Myles, but both love hanging out with their human friends. Of course, they also love some high-energy play time with other dogs!

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: This week we get to meet two best buds from our Carlsbad shelter, Myles and Chief. Chief is a little more outgoing than Myles, but both love hanging out with their human friends. Of course, they also love some high-energy play time with other dogs! To adopt Myles and Chief, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
